title: Easy English Quiz 4
description: Test your basic English skills with this 10-question quiz. Good luck!
instructions: Read each question carefully and select the best answer from the choices provided.
There is only one correct answer for each question.
Once you have answered all the questions, click the "Submit" button to see your score.

items.question: What is the past tense of 'take'?
Which of these sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: I am go to the park.

items.question: What is the present tense of 'to speak'?
What is the past tense of 'write'?
Which of these sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: He is go to the store.

scoring.8-10 correct answers: Excellent! You have a strong command of basic English.
scoring.5-7 correct answers: Good! You have a good understanding of basic English, but there are a few areas where you could improve.
scoring.2-4 correct answers: Fair. You have a basic understanding of English, but there are many areas where you need to improve.
scoring.0-1 correct answers: Needs improvement. You should consider taking an English language course or using resources to improve your English skills.
